sentences: Tema plaan oli läheksid koju homseks.
Meie eesmärgiks on alati läheksid paremale.
context: The word 'läheksid' is the second person singular/plural conditional form of the verb 'lähiema', which means 'to go' or 'to move'. In this conditional form, it expresses a hypothetical action that would happen if certain conditions were met. It can be used to express plans, intentions, or actions that someone would undertake in different scenarios.
